sections.heading: State role in housing and urban development
sections.text: 423.01Finding and declaration of property of tax exemption for housing authorities.423.02Housing projects exempted from taxes and assessments; payments in lieu thereof.423.03Housing debentures exempted from taxation.

sections.heading: Finding and declaration of property of tax exemption for housing authorities.
sections.text: and declaration of property of tax exemption for housing authorities.

sections.heading: Housing projects exempted from taxes and assessments; payments in lieu thereof.
sections.text: projects exempted from taxes and assessments; payments in lieu thereof.

sections.heading: Housing debentures exempted from taxation.
sections.text: 423.03 Housing debentures exempted from taxation.—The debentures of a housing authority, together with interest thereon and income therefrom, shall be exempt from all taxes. The exemption granted by this section shall not be applicable to any tax imposed by chapter 220 on interest, income, or profits on debt obligations owned by corporations. History.—s. 3, ch. 17983, 1937; CGL 1940 Supp. 7100(3-zz); s. 15, ch. 73-327.
